articles.title: China becomes only major world economy to report growth in 2020 | TheHill - The Hill
articles.description: China's economy increased by about 2 percent in 2020, becoming on...
articles.content:
China's economy increased by about 2 percent in 2020, becoming one of the only major countries to report such a growth in the midst of an economically devastating pandemic.
